source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 830,915 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 336,067.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,313, further increased by 870 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
